bodyHome.body: Experience a new way of transaction with JakOnePay

descriptionTermsAndCondition.body: All transactions are good and safe. By continuing this process, the menu approves

permissionDetails: Contact JakOnePay through Bank DKI account
Access JakOnePay balance through Bank DKI
Add Bank DKI promotions to your transactions
accessRequest.message: Bank DKI wants to access this account. By confirming, you give permission to JakOnePay for the following:
details: Contact JakOnePay through Bank DKI account
Access JakOnePay balance through Bank DKI
Add Bank DKI promotions to your transactions
Practically and safely top up your balance with an International Debit or Credit Card
No fees! Top up balance from JakOne Mobile
Anytime, anywhere via bank channels in Indonesia

topupDescription.body: Now you can top up JakonePay through all BKI Bank ATM machines. Follow the steps below to top up JakOnePay
description: Enter Virtual Account Number (9980) followed by your cellphone number
After success, your JakOnePay balance will increase

header: Anytime, anywhere via bank channels in Indonesia
topupDescriptionBankLain.body: You can top up JakOne Pay via transfer via another bank. Follow the steps below to top up JakOne Pay
description: Enter Virtual Account Number (9980) followed by your cellphone number
After success, your JakOnePay balance will increase

header: No balance top up fees from JakOne Mobile
topupDescriptionJakOneMobile.body: Now you can top up JakonePay through all BKI Bank ATM machines. Follow the steps below to top up JakOnePay
description: Masukan No. Virtual Account (9980) yang diikuti dengan nomor Handphone Kamu
Setelah berhasil saldo JakOnePay Kamu akan bertambah

header: No balance top up fees from JakOne Mobile
topupDescriptionDebitKredit.body: Now you can top up JakonePay through all BKI Bank ATM machines. Follow the steps below to top up JakOnePay
